channel.title: If you want to learn java
channel.description:
DONT FUCKING ASK PEOPLE TO TELL YOU, trust me... its more fun to learn yourself xD
I would recommend a because online guides dont work for me... but w.e floats your boat. If you decide to go with a book, any book in the O'REILLY series is a great find, they have books for C++, Java, Javascript, and PASCAL. << highly recomended...
reason im posting this? newbs who ask for a code are annoying... mostly because they think they will just be spoon fed.

item.title: If you want to learn java
item.dc:creator: @Bow_To_Me Bow To Me
item.description:
@Bow_To_Me wrote:

If you want to learn Java, take a class or read a book.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96

@r0ckstar96 wrote:

I’ll look it up, it better not be pricey cuz of it is, then I’ll just stick to internet articles and crap like that.

Read full topic

item.title: If you want to learn java
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

Get the book Java Network Programming, by Merlin and Conrad Hughes, Michael Shoffner, and Maria Winslow (Manning, an imprint of Prentice-Hall)

It will make ur server not be a piece of shit.

Read full topic
item.source: If you want to learn java

item.title: If you want to learn java
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

I stopped asking the superduper noobish questions at around 13 when I started to actually understand a lil bit of Java

Read full topic
item.source: If you want to learn java

item.title: If you want to learn java
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“the hunt, post:1, topic:294398”][quote author=Lord of fallen Angels link=topic=389331.msg2908235#msg2908235 date=1249927115]
I agree, I hate it when people, especially noobs expect they can get whatever they want by asking for it.
[/quote]

oh, like you?

o em gee u can codee rsps u jaba guru[/quote]

lol’d

The fact is, people thing there all over the Java programming language, when most don’t even understand basic Object Oriented. Most are to busy learning how to add commands, rather than learning about how to put it all together.

Read full topic
item.source: If you want to learn java

item.title: If you want to learn java
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

[quote=“degenerate, post:1, topic:294427”]Most people here won’t want to learn Java because they just want to make their RuneScape servers. They probably won’t think that they have any other use for Java than for “coding” some things in their server.

One of the good things about learning a programming language is when you finally create a working program. It’s even better when you created all or most of it from scratch

I’m very, very new to Java, but, I still feel good, even if I just created a simple program… like my “RockPaperScissors game”.[/quote]

It’s a good language, but lots of people here seem to think that Java is only used for RSPS, which is completely and utterly retarded.

Read full topic
item.source: If you want to learn java

item.title: If you want to learn java
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron

[quote=“str rockstar, post:9, topic:294342”]youll be suprised… ive had so many people think there java legends, because they can code a few things in server.

THERES WAY MORE TO JAVA, then they think[/quote]

Wow you must be a ‘heavily coder’

Read full topic
